Header: Suspects arrested with fake currency notes
Content: Ingiriya Police have arrested two suspects along with 13 one thousand rupee currency notes. Ingiriya Police have arrested the suspects when they searched a motorcar following information received by them. After questioning them Police have seized a printer and a laptop which have been used to print the fake currency notes. Meanwhile Vavuniya Police have arrested a suspect with 50 five thousand rupee fake currency notes. He has been arrested at Thekkawatta area in Vavuniya.
